nodes.text: Dirjo Harch was a male member of the Galactic Empire's transmission processing unit for Project Swarm, searching for the Rebel Alliance using probe droids. By the time that he worked on Project Swarm, Harch was new to Imperial service and had not yet been able to climb up the ranks. He took command of the Swarm processing team and was eager to report the success of his colleague Maela to Captain Firmus Piett.
